Text: RE Social and Work Cc the quick response please say hello to Jeff for me thanks Roy Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March PM To Roy Trice Cc Subject Re Social and Work Dear Mr Trice On behalf of Jeff Skilling I am writing to thank you for the invitation to the CAM gala on April Unfortunately Jeff will be unable to join you as he will traveling out of the country on that date With regard to your second invitation to meet your business partner next week I regret to tell you that he is unable to accept the offer He will be in So America and therefore will not attend the GS conference in Aspen Sincerely Sherri Sera Assistant to Jeff Skilling fax Roy Trice on PM To cc Subject Social and Work Jeff Two things Would you like to join Liz and me at the Contemporary Arts Museum Gala Friday April th at Bayou Club Black Tie I would like to introduce you to my business partner Clint Carlson in Aspen next week He is going to attend the Goldman Sachs Natural Gas conference March th st Clint is the chief investment officer of our firm and is the portfolio manager for our relative value arbitrage strategy pairs trading which includes about mm in energy pairs Please let me know Roy Trice
